00026 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00027 // Function: ApiCreateDialog()
00028 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00029 ApiCreateDialog::ApiCreateDialog(VLNV const& vlnv, QWidget* parent) : QDialog(parent)
00030 {
00031     setWindowTitle(QCoreApplication::applicationName());
00032 
00033     QString vlnvStr = vlnv.getVendor() + ":" + vlnv.getLibrary() + ":" +
00034                       vlnv.getName() + ":" + vlnv.getVersion();
00035 
00036     // Create the widgets.
00037     QLabel* msgLabel = new QLabel(tr("API definition %1 does not exist in the library.\nDo you want to "
00038                                      "create a new API definition with the given VLNV?").arg(vlnvStr), this);
00039 
00040     QLabel *directoryLabel = new QLabel(tr("Directory for the API definition:"), this);
00041 
00042     directoryEdit_ = new QLineEdit(createPath(vlnv), this);
00043 
00044     QPushButton* pathButton = new QPushButton(tr("Browse..."), this);
00045     connect(pathButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(selectDirectory()));
00046 
00047     QHBoxLayout *pathLayout = new QHBoxLayout;
00048     pathLayout->addWidget(directoryEdit_, 1);
00049     pathLayout->addWidget(pathButton);
00050 
00051     QPushButton* btnYes = new QPushButton(tr("&Yes"), this);
00052     connect(btnYes, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)), this, SLOT(accept()));
00053 
00054     QPushButton* btnNo = new QPushButton(tr("&No"), this);
00055     connect(btnNo, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)), this, SLOT(reject()));
00056 
00057     QDialogButtonBox* buttonBox = new QDialogButtonBox(Qt::Horizontal);
00058     buttonBox->addButton(btnYes, QDialogButtonBox::ActionRole);
00059     buttonBox->addButton(btnNo, QDialogButtonBox::ActionRole);
00060 
00061     // Create the layout for the dialog.
00062     QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00063     layout->addWidget(msgLabel);
00064     layout->addSpacing(12);
00065     layout->addWidget(directoryLabel);
00066     layout->addLayout(pathLayout);
00067     layout->addWidget(buttonBox);
00068 }

00075 }

00077 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00078 // Function: selectDirectory()
00079 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00080 void ApiCreateDialog::selectDirectory()
00081 {
00082     QString dir = QFileDialog::getExistingDirectory(this, tr("Select Directory"),
00083                                                     directoryEdit_->text());
00084 
00085     if (!dir.isEmpty())
00086     {
00087         directoryEdit_->setText(dir);
00088     }
00089 }
00090 
00091 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00092 // Function: getDirectory()
00093 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00094 QString ApiCreateDialog::getDirectory() const
00095 {
00096     return directoryEdit_->text();
00097 }
00098 
00099 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00100 // Function: createPath()
00101 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00102 QString ApiCreateDialog::createPath(VLNV const& vlnv)
00103 {
00104     QSettings settings;
00105     QString dir = settings.value("general/defaultDir", QCoreApplication::applicationDirPath()).toString();
00106 
00107     if (!vlnv.getVendor().isEmpty())
00108     {
00109         dir += "/" + vlnv.getVendor();
00110 
00111         if (!vlnv.getLibrary().isEmpty())
00112         {
00113             dir += "/" + vlnv.getLibrary();
00114 
00115             if (!vlnv.getName().isEmpty())
00116             {
00117                 dir += "/" + vlnv.getName();
00118 
00119                 if (!vlnv.getVersion().isEmpty())
00120                 {
00121                     dir += "/" + vlnv.getVersion();
00122                 }
00123             }
00124         }
00125     }
00126 
00127     return dir;
00128 }
